ol.li: Make sure you're using Google+ as your profile and your blog is public.
In the left menu, click Settings > Posts, comments and sharing.
Under "Google+ Comments," choose Yes. At the top right, click Save settings.

a.expr:onclick: "window.open("https://www.blogger.com/blog-this.g?n=" + data:blog.title + ": " + (data:post.title ? data:post.title : data:messages.noTitle) + "&u=" + data:post.url + "&t=", "_blank", "directories=no, titlebar=no, toolbar=no, location=no, status=no, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, width=800, height=600");"

"window.open("https://www.blogger.com/blog-this.g?n=" + data:blog.title + ": " + (data:post.title ? data:post.title : data:messages.noTitle) + "&u=" + data:post.url + "&t=", "_blank", "directories=no, titlebar=no, toolbar=no, location=no, status=no, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, width=800, height=600");"

b:attr.expr:value: data:style + " background-image: url(" + (data:post.featuredImage.isResizable ? resizeImage(data:post.featuredImage, data:size, (data:ratioWidth + ":" + data:ratioHeight)) : data:post.featuredImage) + ");"
b:attr.name: style

b:eval.expr: snippet(data:post.body, { length: data:length, links: data:links, linebreaks: data:linebreaks, ellipsis: data:ellipsis })
